author: 朱晶晶
title: 吉林珲春：森林公安启动春季候鸟保护行动 - 民生 - 中工网
text:
中工网讯 （工人日报-中工网记者柳姗姗 彭冰 通讯员张楠）随着气温回升，吉林省延边州珲春敬信湿地迎来大批北归候鸟。作为世界三大候鸟迁徙廊道之一，每年初春，约200余种、百万余只候鸟在此中转栖息，吸引大量游客前来观赏。为守护这些“远方来客”的安全，近日，吉林省公安厅森林公安局珲春森林公安分局迅速行动，启动春季候鸟保护百日专项行动，全力筑牢候鸟保护安全屏障。
百日专项行动期间，各警种协同作战，将属地管理责任细化到所、到岗、到人，依据候鸟迁徙规律制定详细方案，在警力、装备和经费上重点保障。珲春森林公安分局充分发挥党政军警民“五位一体”合力动保优势，与当地政府、林草部门、驻边部队、附近村屯建立候鸟保护联动机制，定期召开联席会议，实现信息共享、责任共担。同时积极协调整合社会各方力量，发动村民、群众、志愿者和警方共同组建季节性护鸟队，壮大保护一线巡护力量，形成了多方协同守护候鸟迁徙安全的强大合力。
在吉林省公安厅森林公安局的大力支持下，珲春森林公安分局在敬信龙山湖候鸟主要栖息区域设置新型移动警务车，成立“候鸟保护移动警务站”，每日安排警力值守，开展区域巡护、游客服务、普法宣传、应急处置等工作；通过云视频监控系统监测，结合车巡、步巡等方式，实现全天候、全方位24小时智慧巡护，实时动态掌握候鸟和区域内人车活动实况，精准预防、打击各类破坏生态资源违法犯罪活动。

author: @Dailyhuntapp
title: Ram Navami 2024: Ayodhya Ram Mandir Will Be Open for 24 Hours, Expecting Footfall of 15 Lakh Devotees
text:
Ahead of Ramnavmi, over 15 lakh devotees are expected to visit the newly built Ayodhya Ram Temple to celebrate the birth of Lord Ram. As per the information received Ram Mandir will remain open for 24 hours from April 15 to April 17 for this occasion, so that devotes can meet their Ramlala anytime they want. Ayodhya is preparing to keep the Ram Mandir open all day, even on April 18 if necessary. Therefore, senior officials of the Ayodhya administration are reportedly holding frequent meetings and reviewing all details.
About 2 lakh devotees visit the Ram temple every day. Sometimes this number goes up to 4 to 5 lakhs. It is said that after hundreds of years of waiting, the Ram Mandir Sankalp has been completed, and on the day of Shri Ram Navami, an ocean of devotees can flock to have a glimpse of Ram Lala, everything is being prepared for this. Ayodhya police has also reviewed the preparations. By keeping the temple open for 24 hours from April 15 to April 17, more devotees will be able to visit Ramlala, officials of Sri Ram Janmabhoomi Teerthkshetra Trust said.
Meanwhile, it is said that the entire work of Ram Mandir will be completed soon. After the inauguration of the Ram Temple by Prime Minister Narendra Modi, many conveniences, facilities, changes and rules were made so that the devotees of Ram could have the darshan of Ram Lala easily. Devotees are said to be benefiting from this.

author: Get News
title: China Invites Global Investment - The 5th 1218 Global Merchants Festival Opens, Gathering Insights on Strategic Business Expansion
text:
On December 18, the 5th 1218 Global Merchants Festival and Annual Brand Investment Case Ceremony commenced in Gaochun District, Nanjing. Supported by the China Association of Small and Medium Enterprises and organized by the Dashangzhidao Investment Group, the event was co-organized by various entities including the Industrial Investment Professional Committee of the China Association of Small and Medium Enterprises, with over 1,800 guests from diverse sectors in attendance.
Shu Min, the initiator of the 1218 Global Merchants Festival, chairman of the organizing committee, and chairman of Dashangzhidao, urged entrepreneurs in his speech to embrace their missions and champion the spirit of entrepreneurship in the new era. He highlighted that the festival, founded by Dashangzhidao in 2019, is dedicated to "vigorously promoting the spirit of reform and opening up, and upholding the flag of the new era of reform and opening up."
With the core principle of "China invites global investment," the festival has established five empowerment systems—industry, resources, investment promotion, communication, and investment—linking local industries with brands, investors, and entrepreneurs. This initiative has created a positive impact across enterprise, industry, and societal levels, becoming a flagship event in the brand investment sector.
Wang Xin, a renowned investment promotion expert, industrial investment mentor at the China Association of Small and Medium Enterprises, and co-founder of Dashangzhidao, noted that the festival emphasizes connection, empowerment, and value, fostering an altruistic mindset. Through its integrated investment promotion system of "Integrate, Invite, and Invest," Dashangzhidao empowers more businesses to achieve investment growth and stimulate investment activities.

author: Jo Abi
title: Kate Middleton is 'getting stronger' according to royal author - 9Honey
text:
The Princess of Wales is "getting stronger every day" according to royal author Jennie Bond, who says the support of husband Prince William has been crucial to her recovery.
In a video released to the public last month, Catherine ﻿revealed she is underdoing chemotherapy treatment for cancer, which was discovered following "planned abdominal surgery" in January.
"She says she's getting stronger every day so I'm sure she's doing her best to join in the outdoor life - the picnic, barbecues and walks on the beach," Bond told Bella magazine.
READ MORE: Liz Hurley responds to rumour she took Prince Harry's virginity ﻿
Kate Middleton is 'getting stronger every day' according to royal author Jennie Bond. (UK Press via Getty Images) Kate made the announcement following weeks of speculation surrounding her whereabouts and wellbeing, explaining the news "of course came as a huge shock".
﻿She said she and the Prince of Wales were taking time out as a family.
The Princess of Wales revealed she is being treated for cancer in a video shared to the public. (BBC Studios) "Most importantly it has taken us time to explain everything to George, Charlotte and Louis in a way that is appropriate for them and to reassure them that I am going to be okay," Kate said.
"As I have said to them; I am well and getting stronger every day by focusing on the things that will help me heal; in my mind, body and spirits.
Royal family at the annual Easter Sunday service: In photos View Gallery In video, Catherine said "having William by my side is a great source of comfort and reassurance".
"It has been an incredibly tough couple of months for our entire family. But I've had a fantastic medical team who have taken great care of me, for which I am so grateful.
Bond says she "expects Catherine and William will blank out any talk of her illness with the kids" as the couple navigate this as a family.
READ MORE: Top rated and reviewed air fryers on Amazon under $150
'I am well and getting stronger every day by focusing on the things that will help me heal,' Kate said. (Samir Hussein/WireImage) Kate's parents and siblings have rallied around her during her health news, with mum Carole and father Michael ensuring Kate is well cared for.
Brother ﻿James shared a photo on Instagram of he and Kate as children along with the caption: "Over the years, we have climbed many mountains together.
"As a family, we will climb this one with you too."
﻿
